Ecosystem

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ecosystem.Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amphibian, Bird, Cellular, Fish, Mammal, Reptile

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animal

        public Animal(java.lang.String type,
              int size,
              int speed,
              int lifespan,
              java.lang.String gender)
        Main constructor for an animal. An animal is an organism that can move around the ecosystem, and eat and drink to maintain its health. Animals also interact with others through hunting and mating. This constructor initializes all of the necessary variables for an effective animal.
        Parameters:
        type - - String representing what class or kind of animal it is
        size - - integer representing how large the animal it is
        speed - - integer representing the speed of the animal's movement
        lifespan - - integer for how long an animal may live
        gender - - String for whether the animal is male or female

      • Animal

        public Animal(Animal animal)
        Copy constructor to construct an animal with identical base traits.
        Parameters:
        animal - represents the instance that is being duplicated

      • Animal

        public Animal(Animal animal,
              boolean birth)
        Constructor for newborn animals from mating.
        Parameters:
        animal - is the parent animal
        birth - represents if a birth occurred

    • Method Detail

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage(java.lang.String imageName)
        Changes the appearance of an animal by accepting a new image name.
        Parameters:
        imageName - is the string representing the name of the new image

      • drink

        public void drink()
        Updates an animal's thirst and health values when it drinks.

      • mate

        public abstract Animal mate(Animal mate)
        Mating between two animals, upon verification of the valid mating process, produces a newborn with base stats. Newborns may or may not be the same type as their parents, as evolution may occur to produce a new type.
        Parameters:
        mate - represents the mate of an animal
        Returns:
        a new instance of an animal created by the mating process

      • mate

        public abstract Animal mate(Animal animal,
                            boolean b)

      • calculateDamage

        public void calculateDamage()
        Inflicts the standard amount of damage that an animal can inflict to other animals.

      • canMate

        public boolean canMate(Animal mate)
        Checks whether two animals share the same type, opposite genders, and are both fertile to validate mating.
        Parameters:
        mate - The animal that this animal is attempting to mate with
        Returns:
        A boolean representing if mating is viable

      • injured

        public void injured(int damage)
        Decreases an animal's health by injury.
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount that health decreases

      • hurt

        public void hurt(Animal prey)
        Inflicts damage to another animal. Hurt calls upon injured to remove health points from the prey.
        Parameters:
        prey - The animal being hunted

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates an animal's status, including an animal's aging process, getting hungry, and getting thirsty. Updating also hurts the animal if conditions are not met. Specific aspects of individual animal types are also considered. Updating usually takes place once per generation, or per timer tick.

      • health

        public int health()
        Returns:
        Integer representing animal's health

        Returns:
        Integer representing an animal's age

        Returns:
        Integer representing animal's lifespan

        Boolean representing if animal can walk on water

        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether an animal hunts

        Returns:
        Boolean representing if an animal is an herbivore

      • makeImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage makeImage(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> strings)
        Creates the animal's image. The method may be repurposed to put together images of body parts to constitute the entire image.
        Parameters:
        strings - List of body parts that make up the animal's image
        Returns:
        A Buffered Image that draws out the complete animal
